titleStmt.title: The Muses gardin for delights, or the fift booke of ayres onely for the lute, the base-vyoll, and the voyce. Composed by Robert Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [William Stansby] the assignes of William Barley,

notesStmt.note: First five words of title are xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
